summary: An ordinance relating to the Civic Auditorium; and authorizing the Superintendent of Buildings to let the use thereof on September 29 to October 5 and October 7 to October 11, 1940, to the Seattle Community Fund, on October 27, 1940, to the Salvation Army and on November 2, 1940 to the Magnolia Orthopedic Guild, at special rentals.
